name: Fixel FID – Pixel NFT Minting
description: Mint unique pixel NFTs on Base Mainnet. Connect your wallet, auto-detect your Farcaster identity, and generate deterministic pixel art NFTs.
ogTitle: Fixel FID – Generate & Mint Pixel NFTs on Base
ogDescription: Deterministic pixel art NFTs generated from your Farcaster identity. Mint on Base Mainnet.
